page.title: 08CHILD'S OPINION OF PLUMSTEAD
page.content: When I was 8yrs of age I used to live in Crystal Palace. It is a very clean place to live in,your neighbours are very good to you and they help out if you're in any trouble. My old door number was 70 and my door was red with black spirals. After that we moved to Elmley St., that block has smashed glass and graffiti all over the walls and still the caretaker doesn't do any thing about it.It's horrible,they should do something about it.Every day I go down the shgops and sign posts are dented and smashed, windows are shattered, car tyres are let down. Shops have fences over their windows. I don't do nothing like that in my block. My door colour is blue and my door number is one nine three. My favorite colour is brown and my bedroom is all brown.
